locutie.beschrijving: The sermon explores the parable of the wheat and tares and Paul's theology of groaning creation. It uses anecdotes (granddaughter, J.C. Beker, gospel concert) to illustrate the 'mingled yarn' of human nature.
locutie.exegetische_kwaliteit: High. Correctly identifies the tension between John the Baptist's judgment and Jesus' delay, and the Pauline indicative of universal sin.

illocutie.beschrijving: Primarily asserting theological truths and explaining biblical context, with a late shift toward promising and declaring.
voorbeelden: The two New Testament lessons are therefore closely connected...
I don’t think he had vestry elections in mind.
It is the Lord who will make the distinction.

perlocutie.beoogd_effect: To instill hope in the midst of moral ambiguity and suffering; to move the hearer from self-judgment to reliance on God's final act.
perlocutie.pneumatologisch_bewustzijn: Moderate. Mentions the Spirit as 'first fruits' via the text, but doesn't explicitly invoke the Spirit's current work in the preaching act.

voorbeelden: The kingdom of heaven may be compared to a man...
Paul is often thought of as the spoiler...
The web of our life is of a mingled yarn.
Let’s take a look at it.
Let the wheat and the weeds both grow together.
The harshness of this judgment startled me.
I look forward to the day...
God would take hold of his creation in a definitive and final way.
The heaven door will swing open... even for prisoners and sinners like you and me.
commissieven.kwaliteit: Strongest at the conclusion; provides a solid foundation for hope.

voorbeelden: In this hope we were saved.
The heaven door will swing open... for you and me.
declaratieven.autoriteit: The preacher speaks with the authority of the 'Toezegging' (Promise) in the final paragraph.

indicatoren: Extensive biographical storytelling about J.C. Beker
Comparison between Paul and Jesus as an academic exercise
constatief_surplus_analyse.effect_op_hoorder: The hearer becomes an observer of 'interesting' theological and biographical facts rather than a participant in a divine event.

missende_elementen: Present-tense commissives in the body of the sermon
performatief_deficit_analyse.effect_op_hoorder: Delayed encounter; the 'event' only happens in the final minute.

toezegging_check.kwaliteit_toezeggen: High quality but low frequency. The promise is inclusive and grounded in Christ's substitution.
voorbeelden: The heaven door will swing open... for you and me.

eerste_persoon.gebruik: Personal anecdotes and 'we' inclusive of the congregation.

tweede_persoon.gebruik: Direct address is rare until the conclusion.
tweede_persoon.performatieve_context: Used effectively in the final promise.

derde_persoon.gebruik: Dominates the exegesis and the Beker story.
derde_persoon.distantie_effect: Creates a 'lecture' feel for the middle 50% of the sermon.

tijdloos_present.gebruik: Theological axioms (e.g., 'All of us are bookkeepers').

actueel_present.gebruik: The 'now' of the gospel promise at the end.

sacramenteel_patroon.beschrijving: Moves from the Assertive (human condition/parable) to the Declarative (Christ took the judgment) to the Commissive (the door will open).
voorbeelden: Jesus Christ would undergo the judgment himself... the heaven door will swing open... for you and me.
sacramenteel_patroon.kwaliteit: Theologically profound; the transition from Christ's work to the hearer's hope is seamless.

voorbeelden_goede_verhouding: In this hope we were saved (Indicative) -> wait for adoption (Imperative/Posture).

diagnostische_evaluatie.diagnose_toelichting: The sermon is a masterful piece of teaching that culminates in a powerful evangelical promise, though it spends much time in the 'constative' mode of storytelling.

sterke_punten.tekstueel_bewijs: Jesus Christ would undergo the judgment himself.
sterke_punten.effect: Shifts the focus from human effort to divine substitution.

zwakke_punten.tekstueel_bewijs: The long section on J.C. Beker's life.
zwakke_punten.probleem: While moving, it functions as 'talking about' grace rather than 'dispensing' it.

diagnostische_evaluatie.gebeuren_toelichting: It becomes an event in the final third when the 'heaven door' is opened for the hearer.
diagnostische_evaluatie.sacramentele_toelichting: The identification of the preacher with the 'sinners like you and me' grants the final promise sacramental weight.

openbaringsleer.god_als_spreker: Implicit. God is the one who 'will make the distinction.'
openbaringsleer.prediker_als_mandataris: Strong. The preacher speaks as one authorized to open the 'heaven door.'
tekstueel_bewijs: I look forward to the day when the evil in my own soul will be rooted out.

pneumatologie.geest_rol_erkend: Yes, as the 'first fruits' and the source of inward groaning.
pneumatologie.perlocutie_theologie: Yes, hope is treated as a gift received, not a work produced.
tekstueel_bewijs: we ourselves, who have the first fruits of the Spirit...

sacramentstheologie.preek_als_genademiddel: Yes, the sermon functions as the 'key' mentioned in the spiritual.
tekstueel_bewijs: the 'heaven door' will swing open, yes... even for prisoners and sinners like you and me.

aanbevelingen.werkwoord_audit_samenvatting: The sermon relies heavily on past-tense narrative. Increasing present-tense performatives earlier would enhance the 'event' character.

specifieke_suggesties.huidige_formulering: The owner says... 'An enemy has done this.'
specifieke_suggesties.voorgestelde_revisie: Hear the householder's word to you: 'An enemy has done this to your life.'
specifieke_suggesties.verschil: Moves from reporting a story to addressing the hearer's reality.

adressering_verbetering.probleem: Too much 3rd person in the middle section.
adressering_verbetering.suggestie: Interweave the 'you' into the Beker story.
voorbeeldzinnen: Like Beker, you too may feel like an apocalyptic battlefield.

aanbevelingen.slotopmerking: A profound example of how theological depth can lead to a performative climax that truly 'opens the door' for the congregation.

comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_schulz_von_thun: SvT would focus on the preacher's 'self-revelation' about her granddaughter; SAT focuses on the 'Declarative' act of opening heaven's door.
comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_retoriek: Rhetoric would praise the 'mingled yarn' metaphor; SAT looks for the 'Commissives' where God binds Himself to the hearer.
comparatieve_analyse.unieke_inzichten_SAT: SAT reveals that the sermon's power is concentrated in the final 10% where the illocutionary force shifts from Assertive to Commissive/Declarative.

kernzinnen_analyse.zin: The heaven door will swing open... for you and me.

appendices.notities: The sermon successfully avoids moralism (Directives) by grounding everything in the Indicative of Christ's judgment.
